availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Levi T. Dix (Bracken County river pilot)

body.p: Residence: Brooksville, Bracken County, Kentucky. A Bracken County, Kentucky-born river pilot. Married Elizabeth Simmons. Father of Edwin Levi Dix and Harry T. Dix.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, District 1, Brooksville post office, p. 69.

Find A Grave, Entry for Levi T Dix (1825-1893), Find A Grave Memorial # 116634837, Evergreen Cemetery, Southgate, Campbell County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=dix&GSfn=levi&GSbyrel=all&GSdyrel=all&GSob=n&GRid=116634837&df=all& (accessed 20 Jul 2017).
